Summary: Green light dropping from sky and disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out walking my two dogs. I went to go and grab a free newspaper to do some clean up dog duty... When I turned around and looked at the moon i saw to the left of the moon a neon green light in the sky. The light was falling down quickly and then disappeared. There were very few clouds in the sky and a full moon was present. The light was at ~ 45 degrees in the sky. I stayed and watched the sky for about 15 minutes longer, but saw nothing. At first I thought it was one of those lights that car dealers shine in the sky to attract customers, but I saw nothing after the one appearance (the light was more like a ball and not a laser or light from a directs source). I am thinking it might have been a meteor?? I was excited when I saw it and kind of freaked out.... my first reaction was to run home and get my camera but I was afraid I would miss it if it appeared again! Also wondered how on earth people do get photos of this stuff since it happened so quickly!! I wanted to call people and tell them! After staring at the sky for about 15 minutes, I decided to walk over towards the direction where I saw the light. I didn't see anything else noteworthy for the rest of the evening. Wondering what it was!
